generated.css: *{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}html{height:100%}.main-content__home{display:flex;flex-direction:column;background:url(18c8a81cf3ed25cad13d565352844676.png) top;background-attachment:fixed;font-family:Sen,sans-serif;position:relative;padding:1rem 0 0;box-shadow:inset 0 0 20px 6px #000;overflow:hidden}.main-content__home:before{content:"";position:absolute;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;background:linear-gradient(#000,rgba(0,0,0,.3),transparent,rgba(0,0,0,.3),#000)}.bar{position:relative;font-size:1.3rem}.bar:before{background:linear-gradient(90deg,transparent,#8da1a9);left:-5.8rem}.bar:after,.bar:before{content:"";position:absolute;height:1px;width:5.4rem;bottom:40%}.bar:after{background:linear-gradient(270deg,transparent,#8da1a9);right:-5.8rem}.main-nav{display:flex;width:100%}.main-nav__area{font-family:Oxanium,cursive;margin:auto}.main-nav__links{display:flex;margin:0 1.1rem 1.1rem}.main-nav__link{margin:0 1rem;list-style:none;z-index:2}.main-nav__link a{text-decoration:none;font-size:.9rem;color:#e1c29e;transition:all .2s ease}.main-nav__link a:hover{color:#fff6ec}.portrait{width:100%;margin:0 0 .6rem}.portrait img{width:84%;max-width:28rem;display:block;margin:0 auto;border-radius:50%;position:relative;border:.125rem solid #9c7244;box-shadow:0 0 20px #000}.portrait img:before{content:"";position:absolute;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;background:rgba(0,0,0,.6)}.contact-section{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;margin:2rem 0 0}.contact-section h3{margin-bottom:1rem;z-index:2;color:#9c7244;text-shadow:0 0 2px #000}.contact-section__contact-info{max-width:28rem;width:84%;text-align:center;color:#fff}.contact-section__box{padding:.8rem .6rem;outline:3px solid hsla(0,0%,100%,.2);margin:1rem 0 1.3rem;cursor:pointer;transition:all .4s;transform:scale(1);color:#fff}.contact-section__box a{text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none;transition:all .4s;color:#fff}.contact-section__box:hover{transform:scale(1.04);background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.8)}.contact-section__box--box1:hover,.contact-section__box--box3:hover,.contact-section__box:hover a{color:#111f25}.about-section{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;width:94%;margin:-1rem auto 1rem;padding:1.4rem;color:#fff}.about-section h3{margin-bottom:1.2rem;z-index:2;color:#9c7244;text-shadow:0 0 2px #000}.about-section__about-info{max-width:28rem;width:100%;z-index:2}#projects-section{position:relative;width:100%;padding:1.85rem 0;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center}#projects-section h3{margin-bottom:1rem;z-index:2;color:#9c7244;text-shadow:0 0 2px #000}.project-section__project{max-width:28rem;width:84%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;position:relative;border-radius:.5%;border:1px solid hsla(0,0%,100%,.4);padding:.8rem;margin:1rem 0;background:rgba(0,0,0,.4)}.project-section__info{width:100%;line-height:1.3rem;z-index:2}.project-section__info h3{text-align:center;margin:.4rem 0 1rem;font-size:1.3rem}.project-section__info p{margin:.6rem;color:#fff}.project-section__btns{display:flex;justify-content:space-around;width:94%}.project-section__btn{margin:.6rem 0;padding:.6rem;border-radius:1%;transition:all .4s ease;transform:scale(1.1);cursor:pointer;text-align:center}.project-section__btn a{transition:all .4s ease;text-decoration:none;margin:.3rem;color:#000}.project-section__btn--btn1{background:#be976b}.project-section__btn--btn1:hover{background:#9c7244;color:#ccc}.project-section__btn--btn1:hover a{color:#ccc}.project-section__btn--btn2{background:#8da1a9}.project-section__btn--btn2:hover{background:#2d5262;color:#ccc}.project-section__btn--btn2:hover a{color:#ccc}.project-section__img{width:100%}.project-section__img img{width:88%;display:block;margin:.8rem auto}.footer-section__footer-info{text-align:center;padding:.6rem 0 1rem;color:#fff;position:relative}@media screen and (max-width:576px){.project-section__btns{display:flex;flex-direction:column;width:auto}}@media screen and (min-width:992px){.large-layout{display:grid}.portrait{margin:0;grid-column:1/2}.contact-section{margin:0;grid-column:1/3;grid-row:2/3}.about-section{grid-column:2/3;grid-row:1/2;width:100%}#projects-section{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr;justify-items:center;align-items:start;grid-gap:1rem;width:100%}#projects-section h3{z-index:2;color:#9c7244;text-shadow:0 0 2px #000;grid-column:1/4}.project-section__btns{display:flex;flex-direction:column;width:auto}}@media screen and (min-width:1200px){.project-section__btns{display:flex;flex-direction:row;width:auto}.project-section__btn{margin:.6rem .8rem}}
